mapper.select: select c.cou_code, c.cou_name, c.cou_period,i.ins_name, c.banner_img, crg.crg_code, ui.ui_name, crg.progress_rate, crg.registrationdate, crg.completiondate, (crg.registrationdate+c.cou_period) courseperiod, cc.enroll_rate, cc.exam_results,ep.exam_score, ep.exam_status from courses c, instructor i, course_registration crg, user_info ui,completion_criteria cc,exam_participation ep where ui.ui_id = #{ui_id} and c.cc_code = cc.cc_code and c.cou_code = ep.cou_code
